name: Beach Trip
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca in their swimwear, relaxing together on a large beach towel.
description: A nice, relaxing getaway from their busy lives.

name: Sleepover
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca relaxing on their bed together.
description: They like to have sleepovers and catch up on what's going on in their lives.

name: Cheering You On
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca in their exercise wear, leaping into the air and cheering.
description: Whatever task you may be struggling with, they believe in you - you can do it!

name: Drinking Buddies
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca sitting on a couch having a beer together.
description: Sometimes the key to unwinding after a busy day is a bit of alcohol.

name: Road Trip
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca in a car together. Naomi is driving, and Rosalia is sitting in the back.
description: When an adventure takes them far away, a road trip is in order. It's about the journey, not the destination.

name: Bed of Flowers
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca laying in a bed of flowers together.
description: Life is short - you should always stop to smell the flowers.

name: Game Session
alt: Naomi sitting on the floor playing on her Switch, Rosalia and Becca on either side of her watching.
description: Taking a moment to play a game together - they really should get some more controllers.

name: Lounging in the Grass
alt: Naomi laying in grass, Rosalia laying next to her with her head on Naomi's stomach, and Becca sitting on her knees on the other side of Naomi.
description: It is important to spend some time outside enjoying the beautiful weather when you can.

name: A Nice View
alt: Naomi sitting on a building rooftop ledge, with Becca and Rosalia sitting on either side of her.
description: This probably isn't the safest place to sit... want to join them?

name: Lunch Break
alt: Becca and Rosalia sitting together in a booth eating a burger and fries, Naomi sitting across from them with a coffee.
description: Not the healthiest of lunch options, but they make a point to eat together whenever possible.

name: Nap Time
alt: Naomi taking a nap on the couch, Rosalia and Becca peeking over the back of the couch to observe her.
description: Exhausted from work, Naomi needed a rest - Becca and Rosalia are glad she's giving herself a break.

name: Nya Nya~!
alt: Naomi, Becca, and Rosalia all pretending to be cats.
description: Meow meow meow mew mew meow purr

name: Trip to the Park
alt: Becca and Rosalia sitting on a park bench together, Naomi standing behind them.
description: While Becca and Rosalia might want a break, Naomi wants to keep moving forward.

name: Picnic!
alt: Naomi, Becca, and Rosalia having a picnic. Rosalia sits on the grass with her food, Naomi sits on a log next to Becca and offers a snack, but Becca refuses
description: It is important to get enough food, but Becca also knows it's important not to overeat.

name: Soaking
alt: Naomi, Becca, and Rosalia all relaxing in an inflatable pool.
description: To beat the heat, soaking in a nice cold pool is the way to go!

name: Reading Before Bed
alt: Naomi reading a book in bed, Rosalia falling asleep next to her, Becca unable to hold back a yawn.
description: They take turns reading to each other to help them fall asleep.

name: Relaxing Outside
alt: Naomi sitting in a field relaxing, Rosalia and Becca sitting on either side of her with their heads on her shoulders.
description: Taking a moment to enjoy the sunshine and catch their breath before the next big adventure.

name: Sneaky Selfie
alt: Naomi sneaking a selfie with Becca and Rosalia in the background.
description: Naomi caught Becca giving Rosalia a hard time, and decided to capture the moment forever.

name: Waterpark
alt: Naomi going down a waterslide, Becca sitting in Rosalia's lap as they go down behind Naomi.
description: They love to go on vacations together. This trip to the water park was one of their favourites.

name: Idol Stage
alt: Naomi, Becca, and Rosalia on stage singing and striking a matching pose.
description: To think, if they weren't adventurers they could have been pop stars.

name: Night Out
alt: Naomi, Becca, and Rosalia sitting in the bench of a nightclub booth.
description: Clubbing is one of their favourite activities. They love to dance!

name: Group Hug
alt: Becca and Rosalia giving Naomi a big hug.
description: The three of them are very close, and share a strong bond.

name: Nature Walk
alt: Naomi, Becca, and Rosalia shading themselves under a tree.
description: Even while out on an adventure, it is always important to stop and appreciate the beauty of the world.

name: At The Pier
alt: Naomi, Becca, and Rosalia sitting on a dock extended out over the water.
description: On hot days, being by the water is an excellent way to cool off.

name: Posing for a Photo
alt: Naomi and Becca sitting down, Rosalia standing behind them, all posed for a group photograph.
description: The Novas love to capture the special moments they share together.

name: Hot Springs
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca soaking in a hot spring.
description: After a busy day of adventuring, soaking in the spring is the perfect way to relax those muscles.

name: Hesitant to Get Wet
alt: Naomi, Rosalia, and Becca standing at the edge of the pool.
description: They went through all the effort to go to the pool, but aren't sure they want to get in.
